property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Set of Offered Courses, Soc.
Identifies a set of courses that are offered within a term.

property.name: summary
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: description
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Term Id

property.name: summary
property.value: Academic term of the courses in the course offering set

property.name: label
property.value: Term Id

property.name: description
property.value: Academic term of the courses in the course offering set

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Subject Area

property.name: summary
property.value:
Subject Area of the courses in the course offering set
This is the first part of the course number, for example "ENG" in "ENG 101"
THIS IS A PLACEHOLDER FOR DEFINING DEPARTMENTAL SOCS NOTE: if a course is cross-listed it is not clear yet if it appears in Socs for both subject areas or just the one main one for the course.

property.name: label
property.value: Subject Area

property.value:
Subject Area of the courses in the course offering set
This is the first part of the course number, for example "ENG" in "ENG 101"
THIS IS A PLACEHOLDER FOR DEFINING DEPARTMENTAL SOCS NOTE: if a course is cross-listed it is not clear yet if it appears in Socs for both subject areas or just the one main one for the course.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Units Content Owner Id

property.name: label
property.value: Units Content Owner

property.name: description
property.value:
The Organization id of the content owner of the courses in this course offering set.
THIS IS A PLACEHOLDER FOR DEFINING DEPARTMENTAL SOCS NOTE: should this be a list of org ids not just one?

property.name: summary
property.value: Create and last update info for the structure.

property.name: description
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.
